content: 11 12 *k6 p1 repeat from * to end row 13 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end 42 stitches row 14 c6f all the way around row 15 knit row 16 *ssk k2 k2tog repeat from * to end 28 stitches row 17 knit finish break yarn and thread through remaining 28 stitches pull tight and to the inside draw yarn through those 28 stitches again give er a gentle yank then weave in wash block wear and get lucky baby ©2008 by weezalana at knittywhipped blogspot com please don t bogart my pattern or use for your own evil gain in other words not for sale profit world domination etc for personal use only and remember be kind and rewind v4 3 08
